name: Remnants (itch) (RedFern Games)
description:
Also we would love feed back on improvements the game is in early development and any money made will be used to pay for good art. All we have now is place holder art.

The game will have an actual storyline, as well as random missions. The story will consist of 3 main acts. All about 5 levels each.

Each subsequent update will be released on itch and anyone that purchased the previous will get it for free.

Send all feedback to cred1608@gmail.com

Note: This release was a previous build we will have the current build up tonight, 12/15/18.
